    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Radio waves and microwaves in communication</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funkwellen und Mikrowellen in der Kommunikation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ondes radio et micro-ondes dans la transmission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ondas de rádio e microondas em uma comunicação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Onde radio e microonde nella comunicazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ραδιο κύματα και μικροκύματα στην επικοινωνία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ondas de radio y microondas en la comunicación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows radiowaves transmitted into ground station and microwaves transmitted from the ground station to the satellite communication in space.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">atmosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ionosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Microwaves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radio broadcasting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Radio waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">satellite communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die radiowaves, die in 
Bodenstation übertragen werden und die Mikrowellen, die von der 
Bodenstation der Verbindung über Satellit im Platz übermittelt 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure montre des ondes hertziennes transmises 
dans la station au sol et des micro-ondes transmises de la station au 
sol à la communication par satellite dans l'espace.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura mostra os radiowaves transmitidos na 
estação à terra e as microondas transmitidas da estação à terra 
à comunicação satellite no espaço.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura mostra i radiowaves trasmessi nella 
stazione a terra e le microonde trasmesse dalla stazione a terra alla 
telecomunicazione via satellite nello spazio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός εμφανίζει ραδιοκύματα που 
διαβιβάζονται στον επίγειο σταθμό και τα μικροκύματα που 
διαβιβάζονται από τον επίγειο σταθμό στη δορυφορική επικοινωνία 
στο διάστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura muestra los radiowaves transmitidos 
en la estación de tierra y las microondas transmitidas de la 
estación de tierra a la comunicación basada en los satélites en 
espacio.</string>
          </description>
